@Aoife_Dooley I know you’re going to counselling which is good but sometimes you need help from medicine too. You’ve been through so much. Again I really admire your honesty. Big hugs x

@Aoife_Dooley You’re really great for posting this thread. It’s very brave of you to be so honest. I was wondering where you were online & then that day you posted a video of you drying your hair. I’m so sorry you’re going through such a shite time. Have you thought of antidepressants?

@yankeedoodlepad The hospital I spend a lot of time in had to have a lot of staff stay over night. Hospitals all over Ireland had to do the same. And the army had to collect medical staff & bring them to work in a lot on instances.

Not that any of them will read this probably, I want to thank all the medical staff around Ireland that have to sleep in the hospitals in case staff for the next day can’t make it in to work.
